INSERT INTO comment (issueId,issueType,userId,parentId,createDate,content) VALUE (#{issueId},#{issueType},#{userId},#{parentId},#{createDate},#{content});
mapper.select: SELECT comment.commentId,comment.issueId,comment.issueType,comment.userId,user.name,user.avatarVersion,pUser.userId AS pUserId,pUser.name AS pName,pUser.avatarVersion AS pAvatarVersion,comment.createDate,comment.content FROM comment LEFT JOIN user ON comment.userId=user.userId LEFT JOIN comment AS parent ON comment.parentId=parent.commentId LEFT JOIN user AS pUser ON parent.userId=pUser.userId WHERE comment.issueId=#{issueId} AND comment.issueType=#{issueType} ORDER BY comment.createDate;
